languages.text: "Лилэтан благоволит мон-кай. Он дарит некоторым из твоих слуг свои особые дары, связывает себя с ними узами. Впервые вижу, чтобы наш мир был столь... терпим к вашему роду. Это напоминает мне, сколь многого я не знаю. Увы, твои сородичи не утруждают себя рассуждением на эту тему. Они боятся одаренных Лилэтан, ненавидят и стремятся убить их. И этому я совсем не удивлен".

"The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."
languages.original_text: "Лилэтан благоволит мон-кай. Он дарит некоторым из твоих слуг свои особые дары, связывает себя с ними узами. Впервые вижу, чтобы наш мир был столь... терпим к вашему роду. Это напоминает мне, сколь многого я не знаю. Увы, твои сородичи не утруждают себя рассуждением на эту тему. Они боятся одаренных Лилэтан, ненавидят и стремятся убить их. И этому я совсем не удивлен".

traits.locale_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants, she connects with them. For the first time I see a world of ours be so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not know. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplations of this circumstance. They fear the Lilaethan's gifted, they despise them and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: “莉莱赞对猴子们一向很仁慈，她向你的部分仆人赠送了特别的礼物，还与他们建立了联系。这还是我第一次看到，我们的世界居然如此……愿意容忍你的族人。这不禁提醒了我，我还有很多事情并不清楚。遗憾的是，你的族人并没有考虑过这些事情。他们惧怕那些获得莉莱赞恩赐的人，他们鄙视那些人，想要杀害那些人。这样的发展，我真是一点都不意外。”
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."

traits.locale_text: “莉莱赞对猴子们一向很仁慈，它向你的一部分仆人赠送了特别的礼物，还与他们建立了联系。我这还是第一次看到，我们的世界如此……愿意容忍你的族人。这不禁提醒了我，我还有很多事情并不清楚。遗憾的是，你的族人并没有考虑过这些事情。他们惧怕那些获得莉莱赞恩赐的人，他们鄙视那些人，想要杀害那些人。这样的发展，我真是一点都不意外。”
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: 「リラエタンはモン＝ケイにとって、利益をもたらした。彼女は召使の一部に、特殊な贈り物を贈る、それが、絆を作るのだとか。我らの世界がこんなに…あなた方のような者に対して寛容的であるのを見たのは初めてだ。まだ、わからないことだらけのようだな。残念だがあなたの親族は、この問題には関わろうとしない。リラエタンからの贈り物に恐れているだろう。彼らを嫌い、殺そうとしている。ま、想定内だがな」
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."

traits.locale_text: 「リラエタンはモン＝ケイにとって、利益をもたらした。彼女は召使の一部に、特殊な贈り物を贈る、それが、絆を作るのだとか。我らの世界がこんなに…あなた方のような者に対して寛容的であるのを見たのは初めてだ。まだ、わからないことだらけのようだな。残念だがあなたの親族は、この問題には関わろうとしない。リラエタンからの贈り物に恐れているだろう。彼らを嫌い、殺そうとしている。ま、想定内だがな」
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: «El Lilaethan ha sido caritativo con los mon-keigh. Otorga regalos especiales a algunos de tus sirvientes y forja vínculos con ellos. Nunca había visto nuestro mundo ser tan... tolerante con los tuyos. Me recuerda que me queda mucho que aprender. Sin embargo, tus parientes no se preocupan por contemplar la situación. Temen a aquellos que reciben dones del Lilaethan, los odian y buscan matarlos. No me sorprende en absoluto».
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."

traits.locale_text: «El Lilaethan ha sido caritativo con los mon-keigh. Otorga regalos especiales a algunos de tus sirvientes y forja vínculos con ellos. Nunca había visto nuestro mundo ser tan... tolerante con los tuyos. Me recuerda que me queda mucho que aprender. Sin embargo, tus parientes no se preocupan por contemplar la situación. Temen a aquellos que reciben dones del Lilaethan, los odian y buscan matarlos. No me sorprende en absoluto».
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "Die Lileath war großzügig zu den Chem-Pan-Sey. Sie macht einigen Eurer Diener besondere Geschenke. Sie baut Bindungen zu ihnen auf. Zum ersten Mal sehe ich unsere Welt so ... tolerant Eurer Spezies gegenüber. Das erinnert mich daran, wie viel ich noch immer nicht verstehe. Euer Volk aber macht sich leider nicht die Mühe, darüber nachzudenken. Sie fürchten jene, die von der Lileath beschenkt wurden, sie verabscheuen sie und wollen sie töten. Und das überrascht mich nicht."
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lileath war großzügig zu den Chem-Pan-Sey. Sie macht einigen Eurer Diener besondere Geschenke. Sie baut Bindungen zu ihnen auf. Zum ersten Mal sehe ich unsere Welt so ... tolerant Eurer Spezies gegenüber. Das erinnert mich daran, wie viel ich noch immer nicht verstehe. Euer Volk aber macht sich leider nicht die Mühe, darüber nachzudenken. Sie fürchten jene, die von der Lileath beschenkt wurden, sie verabscheuen sie und wollen sie töten. Und das überrascht mich niciht."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: « La lilaethan s'est montrée charitable envers les mon-keigh. Elle offre de précieux dons à certains de vos serviteurs et noue des liens avec eux. Jamais notre monde ne s'était montré aussi... tolérant envers vos semblables, ce qui m'a rappelé qu'il y a encore tant de choses que je ne comprends pas. Hélas, les vôtres ne s'embarrassent pas de telles préoccupations. Ils craignent et méprisent ceux qui ont reçu des dons de la lilaethan, à tel point qu'ils cherchent à les tuer. Mais je ne peux pas dire que je sois surpris. »
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."

traits.locale_text: « La lilaethan s'est montrée charitable envers les mon-keigh. Elle offre de précieux dons à certains de vos serviteurs et noue des liens avec eux. Jamais notre monde ne s'était montré aussi... tolérant avec vos semblables, ce qui m'a rappelé qu'il y a encore tant de choses que je ne comprends pas. Hélas, les vôtres ne s'embarrassent pas de telles préoccupations. Ils craignent et méprisent ceux qui ont reçu des dons de la lilaethan, à tel point qu'ils cherchent à les tuer. Mais je ne peux pas dire que je sois surpris. »
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "Lilaethan, mon-keighlere pek cömert davrandı. Kimi hizmetkârlarına özel armağanlar bağışladı. Onlarla bağlar kurdu. Dünyamızı ilk defa size bu kadar... Müsamaha gösterir buluyorum. Böyle şeyler, cahilliğimi yüzüme vuruyor âdeta. Ne yazık ki türünüz, bu meselelere hiç kafa yormuyor. Lilaethan'dan armağan alanlardan korkuyor, onları dışlıyor, öldürmek istiyorlar. Ne yalan söyleyeyim, bu beni hiç de şaşırtmıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan has been charitable to the mon-keigh. She bestows special gifts upon some of your servants; she forges bonds with them. This is the first time I have seen our world so... tolerant of your kind. It reminds me just how much I still do not understand. Alas, your kin do not trouble themselves with contemplating this matter. They fear those gifted by the Lilaethan, they despise them, and seek to kill them. And that does not surprise me at all."

traits.locale_text: "Lilaethan, mon-keigh'lere pek cömert davrandı. Kimi hizmetkârlarına özel armağanlar bağışladı. Onlarla bağlar kurdu. Dünyamızı ilk defa size bu kadar... Müsamaha gösterir buluyorum. Böyle şeyler, cahilliğimi yüzüme vuruyor âdeta. Ne yazık ki türünüz, bu meselelere hiç kafa yormuyor. Lilaethan'dan armağan alanlardan korkuyor, onları dışlıyor, öldürmek istiyorlar. Ne yalan söyleyeyim, bu beni hiç de şaşırtmıyor."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran
